name: Social Welfare Club
description: Organizes charity drives and awareness campaigns, motivates members, and promotes social responsibility to make a real impact.

name: Tech Club
description: Organizes events, builds and supports the team, communicates effectively, and ensures a collaborative environment.

name: Cultural Club
description: Organizes festivals and talent shows, supports members, and fosters a sense of community and creative expression.

name: Creators Club
description: Organizes art and design challenges, inspires members to explore creativity, and helps bring their ideas to life.

name: Sports Club
description: Organizes tournaments and fitness challenges, motivates the team, and represents the club. Sports develop leadership, discipline, and confidence while improving mental and physical health.

name: Filmy Drama Club
description: Organizes film screenings and theater performances, mentors members, and enhances acting, communication, and teamwork skills.

name: Business Club
description: Hosts workshops and networking sessions, inspires entrepreneurial skills, and prepares members for successful careers.
